Element.Name: Customization identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Profile identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: Reminder identifier
Element.Description: An reminder must contain an identifier. The identifier is a number that uniquely define the reminder.

Element.Name: Reminder date
Element.Description: The date on when the reminder instance was issued. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

Element.Name: Reminder type code
Element.Description: A code signifying the type of the reminder.

Element.Name: Reminder sequence number
Element.Description: The number of the current reminder in the sequence of reminders related to the specified payment, i.e. the number of reminders previously sent plus one.

Element.Name: Reminder note
Element.Description: A textual note that gives relevant information about the reminder. Such as the reason for the reminder.

Element.Name: Reminder currency code
Element.Description: A code signifying the default currency for this reminder document. Use codelist ISO4217.

Element.Name: Referenced document identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the referenced document.

Element.Name: Referenced document issue date
Element.Description: The date on which the referenced document was issued.

Element.Name: Referenced document type
Element.Description: A description of the referenced reminder expressed as code.

Element.Name: Seller
Element.Description: The organization or person that deliver an item or service.

Element.Name: Seller electronic address
Element.Description: An identifier indicating seller's electronic address for their messaging. The identifier must be entered as a numerical code according to ISO6523 and consists of one prefix. The prefix specifies the issuer of the identifier, and the actual identifier.

Attribute.Name: Seller electronic address identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The scheme identifier of the sellers's electronic address.

Element.Name: Seller identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the seller. One should enter the identification system when using this element.

Attribute.Name: Seller identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The scheme identification of the seller's identifier.

Element.Name: Seller trading name
Element.Description: The seller's business name.

Element.Name: Seller postal address
Element.Description: Information about the address of the seller.

Element.Name: Seller address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Seller address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: Seller city
Element.Description: The common name of the city, town or village, where the Seller's address is located.

Element.Name: Seller post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Seller country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country.

Element.Name: Seller address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The country in which this address is situated.

Element.Name: Seller country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1. Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Seller legal entity
Element.Description: Identifies the seller's organization number through a national register (Brønnøysundregister).

Element.Name: Seller legal registration name
Element.Description: The name of the seller's as registered with the specified organization number.

Element.Name: Seller legal registration identifier
Element.Description: An identifier issued by an official registrar that identifies the Seller as a legal entity or person. For Norwegian sellers: only numbers are accepted.

Element.Name: Seller legal registration address
Element.Description: The registration address of the legal seller.

Element.Name: Seller legal registration city name
Element.Description: The common name of the city, town or village, where the Seller's legal registration address is located.

Element.Name: Seller country
Element.Description: The country in which this address is situated.

Element.Name: Seller country code
Element.Description: A code signifying this country, and based on ISO3166-1. The code should be entered for the buyer(CustomerParty) and the seller (SupplierParty), to avoid warning messages from Schematron.

Element.Name: Seller contact information
Element.Description: The seller's contact information.

Element.Name: Seller reference identifier
Element.Description: The seller's reference specified as "Their ref."

Element.Name: Seller contact point
Element.Description: A contact name for the seller's contact information.

Element.Name: Seller contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the seller's contact information.

Element.Name: Seller contact email address
Element.Description: An electronic mail address for the seller's contact information.

Element.Name: Party
Element.Description: Specification of the buyer.

Element.Name: Buyer electronic address
Element.Description: An identifier indicating the buyer's electronic address for their messaging. The identifier must be entered as a numerical code according to ISO6523 and consists of one prefix. The prefix specifies the issuer of the identifier, and the actual identifier.

Attribute.Name: Buyer electronic address identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The scheme identifier of the buyer's electronic address.

Element.Name: Buyer identifier
Element.Description: An identifier of the buyer.

Attribute.Name: Buyer identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The scheme identification of the buyer's identifier.

Element.Name: Buyer trading name
Element.Description: The buyer's business name.

Element.Name: Buyer postal address
Element.Description: Information about the address of the buyer.

Element.Name: Buyer address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in an address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Buyer address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: Buyer city
Element.Description: The common name of the city, town or village, where the buyer's address is located.

Element.Name: Buyer post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Buyer address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The country in which this address is situated.

Element.Name: Buyer country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1. Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Party legal entity
Element.Description: Identifies a legal trader through a national register (Brønnøysundregister).

Element.Name: Buyer name
Element.Description: The name of the buyer, which is registered with the relevant legal authority.

Element.Name: Buyer legal registration identifier
Element.Description: The buyer's organization number.

Element.Name: Buyer registration address
Element.Description: The registration address of the legal buyer.

Element.Name: Buyer city name
Element.Description: The post location of a city, town, or village.

Element.Name: Buyer country
Element.Description: The country in which this address is situated.

Element.Name: Buyer country code
Element.Description: A code signifying this country, and based on ISO3166-1. The code should be entered for the buyer (CustomerParty) and the seller (SupplierParty), to avoid warning messages from Schematron.

Element.Name: Buyer contact information
Element.Description: The buyer's contact information.

Element.Name: Buyer reference identifier
Element.Description: The buyer's reference specified as "Their ref."

Element.Name: Seller contact point
Element.Description: A contact name for the seller's contact information.

Element.Name: Buyer contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number of the buyer's contact information.

Element.Name: Buyer contact email address
Element.Description: An electronic mail address of the buyer's contact information.

Element.Name: Payee
Element.Description: The payment receiver or seller issue an invoice. Can be an invoice-company.

Element.Name: Payee electronic address
Element.Description: Identifies the payee electronic address.

Element.Name: Payee identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a payment receiver. If including this element, one should enter the identification system.

Element.Name: Payee name
Element.Description: The business name of the payee.

Element.Name: Payment instructions
Element.Description: Information about the payment.

Element.Name: Payment means type code
Element.Description: The means, expressed as code, for how a payment is expected to be or has been settled.

Element.Name: Payment identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the payment by using means of payment.

Element.Name: Credit transfer
Element.Description: The payee's financial account.

Element.Name: Payment account identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the financial payment account, such as IBAN (International Bank Account Number) or BBAN (Basic Bank Account Number).

Element.Name: Payment account name
Element.Description: The name of the financial payment account.

Element.Name: Financial institution branch
Element.Description: The branch of the financial institution according to the financial payment account.

Element.Name: Payment service provider identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the payment service provider where a payment is located, such as a BIC or a national clearing code.

Element.Name: Note
Element.Description: A textual description of the payment terms.
Element.Value: Payment need to be payed within 20 days.

Element.Name: Paid amount
Element.Description: The sum of amounts which have been paid in advance. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals.

Element.Name: Received date
Element.Description: The date on which this payment was received.

Element.Name: Document level allowances
Element.Description: A discount or charge that applies to a price component.

Element.Name: Document level charge indicator
Element.Description: An indicator that this Allowance charge describes a charge (use true).

Element.Name: Document level charge reason code
Element.Description: The reason for the document level charge, expressed as code.

Element.Name: Document level charge amount
Element.Description: The amount of a charge, without VAT.

Element.Name: Tax total
Element.Description: VAT amount per tax rate and total VAT amount.

Element.Name: Total tax
Element.Description: Total amount for specified amount regime. EHF only denotes the VAT amount.

Element.Name: Tax sub total
Element.Description: Specifies tax amount within different VAT rates.

Element.Name: Tax basis
Element.Description: VAT basis to calculate a tax for a given VAT category.

Element.Name: Tax amount
Element.Description: The total amount of this tax subtotal.

Element.Name: Tax category
Element.Description: VAT basis to calculate a tax for a given VAT category.

Element.Name: ID
Element.Description: The identification code of a VAT category. Use codelist UNCL5305.

Element.Name: Tax scheme
Element.Description: The taxation scheme within this VAT category.

Element.Name: ID
Element.Description: Identifies the tax scheme. Mandatory element, use "VAT."

Element.Name: Monetary total
Element.Description: The total amount payable on the invoice, including allowances, charges and taxes.

Element.Name: Line extension amount
Element.Description: The sum of all line net amounts in the reminder, exclusive VAT. Must be rounded to maximum two decimals.

Element.Name: Payable amount
Element.Description: The outstanding total amount that is requested to be paid. Must be rounded to maximum two decimals.

Element.Name: Reminder line
Element.Description: A line describing a payment past due.

Element.Name: Reminder line identifier
Element.Description: Identifies this reminder line.

Element.Name: Note
Element.Description: Free-form text that gives relevant information, which is not contained explicitly in other structures.

Element.Name: Debit line amount
Element.Description: The amount debited on the reminder line.

Element.Name: Credit line amount
Element.Description: The amount credited on the reminder line.
